scripts.test: prettier -c . && eslint . && tsc -b && pnpm -F 07_cloudflare cf-typegen && tsc -b --noEmit `find examples -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d ! -name '*_js'` && pnpm run -r test

scripts.website:vercel: pnpm run compile && pnpm run website:build --with-vercel-static && mv packages/website/.vercel/output .vercel/
scripts.website:prd: pnpm run website:build && pnpm -F waku-website start
